reviewText: Fascinating story of using modern techniques to find lost Di Vinci painting.  And discovering more about those we though we knew about.
Content rates 5 stars, but Smithsonian destroyed the quality by realeasing it in the 4 by 3 format (black bars on the sides).

Excellent production of a fascinating account. Would have made a great book! I thoroughly enjoyed it. The scientific methods employed in the analysis of the paintings is brilliantly explained and illustrated.

Fascinating account of how one man bucked the scholars and proved that DaVinci's Adoration of the Magi was not all it
seemed and beyond that--must see.
